blocks.headline: TinaCMS: The Ultimate CMS for Next.js
blocks.text: TinaCMS was built with NextJS in mind. It provides an unmatched developer workflow, with amazing visual editing capabilities that your editors will love.

blocks.content:
## Boost Your Next.js Projects with TinaCMS

Developed with Next.js in mind, TinaCMS offers MDX support, visual editing, and the flexibility to deliver content statically or dynamically.

items.headline: Visual Editing
items.text: Experience the ease of TinaCMS's visual editing features, designed to make content management more intuitive and efficient.

items.headline: MDX Support
items.text: Harness the power of MDX to create interactive, component-driven content. With TinaCMS, you can register your MDX components and provide a UI for them.

items.headline: Dynamic & Static Content
items.text: Whether you're serving your content statically or dynamically, TinaCMS can adapt to your needs, providing a versatile platform for your Next.js projects.

items.headline: Open Source Frontend
items.text: TinaCMS's open-source frontend means greater flexibility and customization for your projects. Benefit from regular updates and a thriving community.

items.headline: Seamless Integration
items.text: TinaCMS is built to work smoothly with Next.js, making it a perfect fit for your Next.js projects.

items.headline: Customizable and Extendable
items.text: TinaCMS allows you to create custom field widgets, add custom validation to fields, and create workflows outside of TinaCMS itself, leveraging Git-based content.

blocks.headline: Ready to Supercharge Your Next.js Projects?
blocks.text: Explore how TinaCMS can enhance your Next.js development.

seo.title: TinaCMS for Next.js: Power Up Your Development
seo.description: Transform your Next.js projects with TinaCMS, offering visual editing, MDX support, and the flexibility to deliver content in both static and dynamic ways. Experience a seamless, customizable CMS solution.
